author: tbenr
content: With regard to JWT setup, an idea that came into my mind is that we could standardize the unauthorized error when CL calls the json-rpc endpoint without\wrong a JWT and respond with the file path. there's might be some security implication but the CL then could automatically try to load that file and try again
